user_query: I want to create unique invitations using QR codes for a surprise party and gather information on a reliable money transfer portal.

TaskList.description: Gather event details for the surprise party, including date, time, and location.
Generate red QR codes using the event details gathered in Subtask 1.
Research and find a reliable money transfer portal.
Gather information on the security features of the selected money transfer portal from Subtask 3.
Gather information on the transaction process of the selected money transfer portal from Subtask 3.
